definition: to be violent; by implication, to maltreat
kjvTranslation: make bare, shake off, violate, do violence, take away violently, wrong, imagine wrongfully.

translations.bg: да се държа жестоко; по подразбиране - да се отнасям зле
translations.da: at være voldelig; underforstået at mishandle
translations.de: gewalttätig zu sein; implizit, zu malträtieren
translations.el: να είναι βίαιος, να κακομεταχειρίζεται, να κακομεταχειρίζεται
translations.nb: å være voldelig; underforstått, å mishandle
translations.ro: a fi violent; implicit, a maltrata
translations.sv: att vara våldsam; underförstått, att misshandla
translations.tr: şiddet uygulamak; ima yoluyla, kötü muamele etmek
translations.uk: бути насильницьким; непрямим чином - жорстоко поводитися
